    • Method Detail

      • revokeLicense

        void revokeLicense(java.lang.String operationId)
        Revokes the license for the given operation. This does not make any permanent changes to the license, so the main use is for testing.
        Parameters:
        operationId - the operation to revoke the license for (cannot be null)

      • restoreLicense

        void restoreLicense(java.lang.String operationId)
        Restores a previously revoked license. If the operation was not allowed before the revoke call then calling this method will not grant the operation. No permanent changes are made the the license files, so the main use is for testing.
        Parameters:
        operationId - the operation to revoke the license for (cannot be null)

      • getLicenseTypes

        IContributorLicenseType[] getLicenseTypes()
                                          throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns types of known CAL licenses, not include default licenses.
        Returns:
        a list of know license types.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • assignLicense

        void assignLicense(IContributorHandle contributor,
                 java.lang.String licenseId)
                   throws TeamRepositoryException
        Assigns a license to a contributor. The caller must have admin permissions.
        Parameters:
        contributor - the contributor to get the license (cannot be null)
        licenseId - the license to assign (cannot be null)
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if the assignments fails, such as when there are no more licenses available to assign
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in license id does not correspond to a valid license type.

      • unassignLicense

        void unassignLicense(IContributorHandle contributor,
                   java.lang.String licenseId)
                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Unassigns a license from a contributor. The caller must have admin permissions.
        Parameters:
        contributor - the contributor to lose the license (cannot be null)
        licenseId - the license to unassign (cannot be null)
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if something goes wrong

      • unassignAllLicenses

        void unassignAllLicenses(IContributorHandle contributor)
                         throws TeamRepositoryException
        Unassigns all licenses from a contributor. The caller must have admin permissions.
        Parameters:
        contributor - the contributor to lose all licenses (cannot be null)
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if something goes wrong

      • getAssignedLicenses

        java.lang.String[] getAssignedLicenses(IContributorHandle contributor)
                                       throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the set of assigned licenses for a given contributor.
        Parameters:
        contributor - the contributor to find the licenses for (cannot be null).
        Returns:
        the set of license ids currently assigned to the contributor; Never null.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • setLicensePurchaseCount

        void setLicensePurchaseCount(java.lang.String licenseId,
                           java.lang.Integer newMax)
                             throws TeamRepositoryException
        Updates the number of licenses that have been purchased. This method will fail if the new maximum exceeds the maximum licenses allowed by the current server license. The caller must have admin permissions.
        Parameters:
        licenseId - the license id to update (cannot be null)
        max - the new maximum licenses.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong

      • addLicense

        void addLicense(byte[] licenseFileContents)
                throws TeamRepositoryException
        Adds the license to the list of stored licenses. The new license can be either a server or contributor license.
        Parameters:
        licenseFileContents - the contents of the license file
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong

      • addLicenses

        com.ibm.team.repository.common.model.ILicensesInfo addLicenses(java.lang.String[] localFiles,
                                                             boolean submit)
                                                               throws TeamRepositoryException
        Adds the set of licenses to the server and returns the state of the server after the add. If submit is false then the licenses are not really added and the return value is the calculated value of what the server state would look like if submit had been true
        Parameters:
        localFiles - the licenses to be added
        submit - whether to apply the licenses or not
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong

      • removeLicense

        void removeLicense(byte[] licenseFileContents)
                   throws TeamRepositoryException
        Removes the license to the list of stored licenses. The new license can be either a server or contributor license.
        Parameters:
        licenseFileContents - the contents of the license file
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong

      • removeLicenseById

        void removeLicenseById(java.lang.String id)
                       throws TeamRepositoryException
        Removes a license by its id
        Parameters:
        id -
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • getServerLicenseType

        IServerLicenseType getServerLicenseType()
                                        throws TeamRepositoryException
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • getLicensedContributors

        IContributorHandle[] getLicensedContributors(java.lang.String licenseId)
                                             throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns a list of contributors who have been assigned the given license.
        Parameters:
        licenseId - the license id to search for
        Returns:
        a list of contributors who have been assigned the given license
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if anything goes wrong

        boolean isValidLicense(java.lang.String licenseId)
                       throws TeamRepositoryException
        Is valid license
        Returns:
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • getLicenseAgreement

        java.lang.String getLicenseAgreement(java.lang.String licenseId)
                                     throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the license agreement text for passed in license id.
        Parameters:
        licenseId -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • reassignLicense

        ILicenseAdminService.BatchResult reassignLicense(java.lang.String sourceLicenseId,
                                               java.lang.String targetLicenseId,
                                               IContributorHandle... contributors)
                                                 throws TeamRepositoryException
        Reassigns the users from the source license to the target license. The caller must have admin permissions.
        Parameters:
        contributors - the array contributor to get the license (cannot be null)
        licenseId - the license to assign (cannot be null)
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - if the assignments fails, such as when there are no more licenses available to assign
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in license id does not correspond to a valid license type.

      • assignLicenseWithResult

        ILicenseAssignmentResult assignLicenseWithResult(IContributorHandle handle,
                                               java.lang.String licenseId)
                                                 throws TeamRepositoryException
        Assigns a license to a user and returns an object representing the result of the assignment.
        Parameters:
        handle - The contributor being assigned a license
        licenseId - The license to assign
        Returns:
        The result of the assignment
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - If an error occurs during assignment
        Since:
        4.0.1
